column2: 1. Exports and imports of certain goods, primarily military equipment purchased
and sold by the federal government, are included in services.  Beginning with 1986,
repairs and alterations of equipment are reclassified from goods to services.
2. Consists of capital transfers and the acquisition and disposal of nonproduced
nonfinancial assets.  Prior to 1982, reflects only capital grants paid to the U.S.
territories and the Commonwealths of Puerto Rico and Northern Mariana Islands.
